Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. It's worth $8,000 to you, just like it is to me. Considering its value and quality, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $7,200. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that is both valuable and highly sought after. Let's make this deal happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
